Package ua.java.conferences.model.dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityDAO<User>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MysqlUserDAO
    public interface UserDAO
extends EntityDAO<User>
    User DAO interface. Implement methods due to database type

    • Method Detail

      • getByEmail

        java.util.Optional<User> getByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
                             throws DAOException
        Obtains instance of User from database by email
        Parameters:
        email - - value of email
        Returns:
        Optional.ofNullable - user is null if there is no user
        Throws:
        DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

      • getSorted

        java.util.List<User> getSorted​(java.lang.String query)
                        throws DAOException
        Obtains sorted and limited list of users from database
        Parameters:
        query - should contain filters, order, limits for pagination
        Returns:
        users list that matches demands
        Throws:
        DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

      • getParticipants

        java.util.List<User> getParticipants​(long eventId,
                                     Role role)
                              throws DAOException
        Obtains list of users that registered for the event from database
        Parameters:
        eventId - - value of event id
        role - can be either VISITOR or SPEAKER
        Returns:
        users list that matches demands
        Throws:
        DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

      • getNumberOfRecords

        int getNumberOfRecords​(java.lang.String filter)
                throws DAOException
        Obtains number of all records matching filter
        Parameters:
        filter - should contain 'where' to specify query
        Returns:
        number of records
        Throws:
        DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

      • isRegistered

                     long eventId)
